sourceOfFunds.purpose: The main objectives of the IWMP are to restore the ecological balance by harnessing, conserving and developing degraded natural resources such as soil, vegetative cover and water. The outcomes are prevention of soil run-off, regeneration of natural vegetation, rainwater harvesting and re-charging of ground water table. This enables multi-cropping and the introduction of diverse agro-based activities, which help to provide sustainable livelihoods to the people residing in the watershed area.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The above society named Nirashrit Mahila Bal Vikas Gramodog Shiksha Samiti, Bharatpur organised in 1986. Through society worked before the registered in the society i.e. Humanities Social Services, Child Welfare, Women Welfare, Education, E.T.C. The society also worked for awareness of hygiene specially for rural area. The society also worked in the field rural Health services, Educational for Children, Women security in the society and as well as family also. Society also organised camp in the rural area, to aware the ladies for their own rights. Society organised the camp at Barkeda, Rudawal, Niyamadpur, Halena, Madholi and other places. Society also organised the National integration camp at Bharatpur, in the camp the student take parts in the different parts of India as Rajasthan, Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh, Haryana, Bihar, Delhi and Punjab also. The students take part in deferent activities. They learn the integration, social activities, religious, and culture of different culture of states. The society also take keen interest in the consumer welfare. The society also aware to the general public for consumer rights. So that the public take notice for their right. The society also toke active part to the service for our society senior old persons. The society give the counselling service to the family member and old persons also, to make them good understanding. With this society also provide then food and clothes also time to time the old persons also examine by the physician with this society also arrange the religious programmes also. With the own effect society get the project on Alcohol and drug dependently. The society is found with this programme for a long period. Hence the patients admitted and get treatment for Alcohol, Heroin opium, Cannabis, Injection and Sleeping pills and other deferent type of drugs. Society provide the treatment facility by medicines, Allopathic, Yoga, Counselling consulting with clients individually groups, and family members also. Because the client will return to their home within the family members. After treatment we follow-up the clients to know the welfare. The society also provide them occupational programme and arrange the financial assistance to the clients. The society has given the treatment more over 1,500, clients successfully. The clients cames from Rajasthan, Agra, Deeg, Bayana, Mathura, Kasganj, Etah, Firozabad & Delhi and some any other places. The society also having the programme of family counselling centre, at Bharatpur in this centre we registered the case of family problems and try to solve them by the counselling here we get the cases of family violence. Dowry family disturbance, drug dependants extra marital relations and other types of cases. We try to solve them counselling, mostly the cases solve by counselling. We also proved same occupations and financial assistance also our centre deal about more then 300 cases with successfully. The society also running a centre for craft and sewing, where the ladies learn sewing the clothes and knit the wastend clothes. Where the ladies get job and they can do own work. In this way society provide the occupation to the ladies for ST & SC. specially. The society also gives the educational assistance to the ST/SC students for primary classes. The society also provide the mid day meal, uniforms and books to the students.
